text: One Cyrus is not enough for NBC's The Voice. Pop superstar Miley Cyrus has invited her father, country artist Billy Ray Cyrus, to be her team advisor for the upcoming Season 13. Miley revealed the news via Instagram in a post littered with # TeamMiley and # TeamDad hashtags, obviously proud to bring the family flag bearer into the mix. Billy Ray, best known for his'90s country smash ` ` Achy Breaky Heart,'' released a 25th anniversary version of the iconic song in 2017, complete with a new Spanish version, Spanglish dance version and Bootsy Collins EDM version.
